ie.dcu.cngl.summarizer

Interface IWeighter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Weighter

    public interface IWeighter
    Provides interface for weighting sentences being considered for inclusion in end summary.
    Author:
    Shane

        void calculateWeights(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double[]> weights)
        Adds the weights returned by each feature to the provided weights list.
        Parameters:
        weights - Target location for calculated weights (may contain pre-calculated weights)
